Statute.Title: Zero Tolerance for Barbaric Cultural Practices Act

OtherLangTitle.Emphasis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, the Civil Marriage Act and the Criminal Code and to make consequential amendments to other Acts, An Act to amend the

Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Tolérance zéro face aux pratiques culturelles barbares, Loi sur la)

Item.Text: — ss. 1, 4 and 5 in force on assent 18.06.2015
— s. 2 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 3 — Not in force
— ss. 6 to 15 in force 17.07.2015 see SI/2015-67

CIF.Text: CIF, 2018, c. 15 in force on assent 21.06.2018
